title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.5 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.5 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

The commission will hold a public hearing on such petition. A notice giving the time and place for such hearing will be prepared by the
commission and forwarded to the clerk of the board of supervisors with a list
of papers in which it is to be published and a statement of the times of
publication. Proofs of such publication and receipted bills therefor will be
required to be filed at the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
